alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; Lower Washington County; San Rafael Swell; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 02 at 2:51PM MDT until August 02 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Castle Country, Central Mountains, San Rafael Swell, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Bryce Canyon Country, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell, South Central Utah, Southern Mountains, Upper Sevier River Valleys, Western Canyonlands, Lower Washington County, Southwest Utah and Zion National Park. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive rainfall may result in flooding of slot canyons, normally dry washes and small streams. Debris flows from recent burn scars are also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms capable of producing torrential rain are expected to develop and spread across southwest Utah this morning, then move east across the remainder of the watch area this afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; Lower Washington County; San Rafael Swell; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Zion National Park
